sentences.sentence: After much legal disputation our right to resign was established.
sentences.translation: 在经历了多场法律上的争论后，我们的辞职权终于得以成立。

sentences.sentence: Formal disputation of such an issue.
sentences.translation: 关于这种论题的正式辩论。

sentences.sentence: It is a matter of disputation whether they did the right thing.
sentences.translation: 他们做得对还是错，这是争议之处。
